title: Keyboard Monitor MYSTERY TECH!
description: Check out the Heineken Closer!  Today on Mystery Tech things get a little steamy   Hovering UFO Speaker on Amazon:   Ficihp Keyboard Display on Amazon:  Novium Hoverpen 2.0 on Amazon:   Genki ShadowCast on Amazon:  Playdate:  SereneLife Portable Sauna on Amazon:    By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe to Ken's channel @Denki!  More shenanigans on @thisis:   My new F1 show @TheBackmarkers!  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:
